title: New: Daniel Wilson – Wedding Daze
body:
There’s some real funky, Gnarls Barkley vibes coming from Daniel Wilson on his latest offering, Wedding Daze.

A few more tracks like this, and Wilson will become a staple sound of the summer.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
